enhanced_description: First Meridian is a human resources platform, formed by world-renowned investors, focused on building a leading organization powered by technology and innovation. It operates through established brands including InnovSource, V5 Global Services, Affluent Global Services, CBSI Global, and RLabs Enterprise Services. As an end-to-end HR solutions provider, First Meridian combines extensive experience in HR solutioning with future-ready technology to help organizations and talented individuals achieve their objectives. The platform serves a large network, working with over 1200 clients and providing employment to over 126,824 people across more than 3500 locations, demonstrating its comprehensive reach and ability to deliver full-spectrum HR solutions.
